</td><td>

Ensure two identically-named procedures don't exist. Take the proposed procedure name, and return a legal name i.e. one that is not empty and doesn't collide with other procedures.

## Variables

<table><thead><tr><th>

Variable


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

[CATEGORY\_NAME](./blockly.procedures_namespace.category_name_variable.md)


</td><td>

String for use in the "custom" attribute of a category in toolbox XML. This string indicates that the category should be dynamically populated with procedure blocks. See also Blockly.Variables.CATEGORY\_NAME and Blockly.VariablesDynamic.CATEGORY\_NAME.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[DEFAULT\_ARG](./blockly.procedures_namespace.default_arg_variable.md)


</td><td>

The default argument for a procedures\_mutatorarg block.


</td></tr>

<tbody><tr><td>

[ProcedureTuple](./blockly.procedures_namespace.proceduretuple_typealias.md)


</td><td>

Legacy means of representing a procedure signature. The elements are respectively: name, parameter names, and whether it has a return value.
